divs: Sighting DetailsI stepped out of my apartment to have a cigarette, it was cold. I glanced at the sky as I do frequently and saw a glowing object that was moving. It was not a clear night, there was a dull grey cloud covering. The object did not move erratically, no flashing lights no associated anomalies just a glow which I observed for less than a minute until I lost it behind a mass of clouds or it disappeared on its own. It was not a satelitte or the space station. I would have reported it sooner but have been offline until recently. This was the first time I had seen anything that I could not identify or reason away. I was of course enthralled and promptly phoned a friend of mine who is ex military and a pilot, described the event to him and he was skeptical but receptive. It was a startling event being the first time I personally had experienced anything solid. Vivid dreams are compelling but just that, dreams. This was really there.
Summary: Glowing object, moved across the sky south to north.
